tool.name: AppendLigand
tool.description: : This class takes a ligand ITP file and inserts it in a topology.

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the input topology TOP and ITP files zipball. Format: [input].zip

param.name: input_itp_path
param.label: input ITP file
param.help: Path to the ligand ITP file to be inserted in the topology. Format: [input].itp

param.name: input_posres_itp_path
param.label: input ITP file
param.help: Path to the position restriction ITP file. Format: [input].itp

param.name: outname_output_top_zip_path
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path/Name the output topology TOP and ITP files zipball Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: posres_name
param.label: posres_name
param.help: String to be included in the ifdef clause.
